title: ISurfExtrudeFeatureData.KnitResult
description: Gets or sets whether to knit the bodies created by deleting original faces in an extruded surface.
returns: True to knit the bodies created by deleting original faces, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is only available if:
ISurfExtrudeFeatureData::BothDirections
= false.
ISurfExtrudeFeatureData::DeleteOriginalFace
= true.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
